participant_1.background:
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
my name is john and i live in dallas , tx.
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.

participant_2.background:
I take comfort in my dog's love and companionship when I'm feeling down.
i work for an architect firm.
I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time.
i am currently looking for employment.
i work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for fun?
I like to watch movies and play video games.
That's awesome! I like to read books and snuggle up with my cat.
I love animals! I have a dog who is my best friend.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your dog's name?
His name is Buddy and he's a Golden Retriever.
Golden Retrievers are the best! I have a cat named Mittens.
I love cats! What's your favorite thing about Mittens?
She's always there for me when I need her.
That's what makes pets so great!
What's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites.
I know what you mean! I can't choose just one either.
I guess I'd have to say The Shawshank Redemption.
That's a great movie! I love it too.
It's one of my go-to movies when I'm feeling down.
Me too! It always cheers me up.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I'm sure we'd get along great if we met in person.
I think so too
